attributes.action: Aid in the fight against Global Warming by getting government departments to be more energy efficient.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After visiting many government sites it has become apparent that the PM talks about Global Warming but does not act. In one office the temperature was 30 degrees, it seemed like they were single handedly warming the planet. With that and the thousands of PC's and Monitors left on 24/7 they waste more energy in a week than a village does in a year.
